data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Saint-Barthélemy.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Saint-Barthélemy
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Saint-Barthélemy, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saint-Barthélemy a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the country.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Please, teach the 920 believers in Saint-Barthélemy how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 920 believers in Saint-Barthélemy to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the country of Saint-Barthélemy unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, there are 8,188 people in the country of Saint-Barthélemy who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.section_summary:
the country of Saint-Barthélemy has a population of 9,200.

We estimate Saint-Barthélemy has 920 people who might know Jesus, 8,188 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 92 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
